Class JavaField

java.lang.Object
  xtc.tree.Visitor
      translator.JavaScope
          translator.JavaVisibleScope
              translator.JavaField
All Implemented Interfaces:
ItemVisibility, Nameable, Typed
Direct Known Subclasses:
JavaField.ScopeField
public class JavaField
extends JavaVisibleScope
implements Nameable, Typed

Represents a "standard" java field.

          A special-case class for Formal Parameters -- allows us to reuse code from JavaField while taking into account the different setup for FormalParameter.

          For variables that should never be printed.

getCppName

public java.lang.String getCppName(boolean fullName,
                                   boolean staticAccessor)
Gets the C++ name for a field. If the field is static, it gets the static accessor method, unless otherwise specified.

mangleName

public void mangleName(java.util.HashSet<java.lang.String> fields)
Mangles field names so that each field can be uniquely represented by its 'ClassName__FieldName' It should be noted that we had to resort to this name mangling algorithm because Grimm has failed us all... twice
